name: TechHunter
description:
• GAMEPAD REQUIRED (at this point)
  • Top Down Shooter
  • Procedural level generation
  • Upgradeable stats
  • Buggy - You will experience some crashes, and levels that are genereated in a way that they are impossible to beat

Developed over the course of 4 or so weeks, so it is what it is right now ;)
